venue.address_1: near Meriden Mall ( will give address to RSVP's the day before)
venue.name: Brett's House

item.description:
Good Ole' Fashioned Bonfire.  - Good Friends, Good Drinks, Good  Times

This was such a success and everyone made it so enjoyable I decided to host another one.

                  Will Be Provided: Marshmallows, popcorn, all the firewood we can burn, and Brett's Wild Party Punch!

What you Should bring: Sweater, blanket and/or camp chair. People are encouraged to bring additional alcohol. I'm asking for donations of bags of ice, and snacks.  IF you have fallen branches /wood around your place.. feel free to bring it, we can make the fire Huge this time to keep everyone warm!   Asking for $3 each for the Party Punch to help with costs. Thanks!!

 WARNINGS: Severe Rain the evening of the event Does not Cancel the Event. IN the case of severe rain, the first 20 people to have RSVP'd are still invited for an In house/deck party. So sign up early ehh? Those with a fear of dogs, fun or an intolorance to alcohol should NOT attend.

Blankets worked as well if not better than chairs. so if you want to bring one its a good idea. It is also steadily getting colder so don't forget a hoodie, or blanket for warmth..

ANY QUESTIONS CALL BRETT'S CELL PHONE 203-651-9166
item.how_to_find_us: How to find us..... Open you eye!
item.name: Fall Bon Fire !!
